name: Enlightenment (itch) (psygin, MrLulez)
description:
Forgetting him roots, Lova had strayed far from her essence. There was something in him that was making him uneasy, feelings he couldn't figure out.

Our game progresses by controlling a character who is trying to remember his roots in the adventure genre. As the missions are completed, the roots advancing on the map unite and reveal a big secret.
